LightningComponentBundle.description: An image and inline text that work in tandem to communicate a state in a more friendly way. Use within other components, such as cards, to express the state of the component.

property.label: Heading
property.name: heading
property.description: Text displayed below the image to describe why it is being displayed. Should always be specified unless `Text Only` is checked.

property.label: Message
property.name: messageBody
property.description: Text displayed below the Heading to provide further description about the why the illustration is being displayed.

property.label: Image
property.name: imageName
property.description: The image to show. Please check the image names from component documentation

property.label: Image Size
property.name: imageSize
property.description: Size, can be either small or large

property.label: Text Only
property.name: textOnly
property.description: Whether or not to hide the image from the layout.

property.label: Call to Action
property.name: showCallToAction
property.description: Show call to action, currently it only supports Creating a Case

property.label: Field Set Name
property.name: fieldSetName
property.description: Field Set Name which defines the fields to be shown on CTA. Mandatory if CTA is enabled

property.label: Case Description
property.name: caseDescription
property.description: This value would be pre-populated on the Case Description. Use only if needed

property.label: Case Topic
property.name: caseTopic
property.description: Topic of the Case. Don't forget to select a valid value from the picklist on Case.

property.label: Is Manual Case?
property.name: isManualCase
property.description: Set as true if you want to create a Manual Case rather than an Instant Case.
